message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's designed to meet your specific needs and expectations. Considering its value to you, I propose a price of $10,000. This is a great opportunity to secure an item that is worth $12,000 to you at a competitive rate.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $10,000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. Let me know your thoughts.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to adjust my offer accordingly. Considering the value of the product to you, I would like to propose a price of $9,500 for the product. This is a fair compromise between our previous offers, and I believe it will be beneficial for both of us.
